name: Info-Surge
tag_list: online-patient-education, patient-care, risk-management, bariatric-surgery-patient-education, aesthetic-surgery-patient-education, e-learning, multimedia-courses
overview:
Info-Surge helps healthcare professionals educate patients before and after medical procedures. Using Info-Surge’s web-based platform clients can save money, improve patient satisfaction, and streamline business pipeline.

Using the service patients access information about their desired procedure directly from the providers website. Patient participation is recorded for enhanced risk management and assistance in clinical management.

Although Info-Surge offers patient education materials within the system client can create their own education resources on the fly.
